Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.OOP.ovrloading.repr

[docs]class Adder:
    def __init__(self, value=0):
        self.data = value

    def __add__(self, other):
        self.data += other

    def __radd__(self, other):
        self.data += other




[docs]class Multip():
    def __init__(self, value=0):
        self.data = value

    def __mul__(self, x):
        self.data = self.data * x

    def __rmul__(self, other):
        self.data = self.data * x




[docs]class AddRepr(Adder, Multip):
    def __repr__(self):
        return 'addrepr(%s)' % self.data



if __name__ == '__main__':
    x = AddRepr(2)
    y = AddRepr(3)
    x + 1
    print(x)
    x + 2
    print(x)
    1 + x
    print(x)

    x * 2
    print(x)

    z = y + x
    print("y: ", y)
    print("x: ", x)
    print("z: ", z)

    x = AddRepr(2)
    y = AddRepr(3)

    z = x + y
    print("y: ", y)
    print("x: ", x)
    print("z: ", z)
